metadata.title: CVE-2017-9130 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The faacEncOpen function in libfaac/frame.c in Freeware Advanced AudioCoder (FAAC) 1.28 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(invalid memory read and application crash) via a crafted wav file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9130` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

faac - 1.29.7.7-1
libfaac0 - 1.29.7.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: faac package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.29.7.7-1').
